Class LibrarySystem

java.lang.Object
LibrarySystem
public class LibrarySystem
extends java.lang.Object

    (package private) static TableReminder t_reminder
    Table reminder for warning
    private static java.util.Queue<Student> tableReservationLine
    Students who want to buy a table after all tables are filled are registered in this tableReservationLine.
    private static java.util.PriorityQueue<Table> tables
    All tables are sorted with PriorityQueue according to the duration of the student sitting at the table.

    protected static Book acceptRejectBookRequest​(Student student, java.lang.String bookID)
    Method to approve book request
    protected static void acceptRejectTableReservation​(Student student)
    Method to approve or deny table reservation for student request If there is empty table at the library it takes TableID then according to table's status approves or denies reservation If there is no empty table at the library it asks user whether wait or not then according to answer adds user to waiting queue or not

  • Field Details

    • students

      private static SkipList<Student> students
      students also registers those who are registered as students. Skip List is sorted by id.

    • librarians

      private static java.util.ArrayList<Librarian> librarians
      librarians also registers those who are registered as students.

    • tables

      private static java.util.PriorityQueue<Table> tables
      All tables are sorted with PriorityQueue according to the duration of the student sitting at the table.

    • books

      private static AVLTree<Book> books
      All books coming to the system are stored in the AVL tree. While listing the AVL tree, unique ids are checked.

    • tableReservationLine

      private static java.util.Queue<Student> tableReservationLine
      Students who want to buy a table after all tables are filled are registered in this tableReservationLine. tableReservationLine is a queue.

    • t_reminder

      static TableReminder t_reminder
      Table reminder for warning

    • b_reminder

      static BookReminder b_reminder
      Book reminder for warning

    • myGraph

      private static ListGraph myGraph
      Library Map

      Default constructor of LibrarySystem

  • Method Details

    • initializeTableData

      private void initializeTableData​(int capacity)
      Method to initialize table data to priority queue according to their time values Every table status is "available" and time is 0 at the beginning
      Parameters:
      capacity - Integer for priority queue capacity (number of tables)

    • initializeStudentData

      private void initializeStudentData()
      Method to initialize student datas to skip list according to their IDs Every student's name,surname,ID and password initialized

    • initializeBookData

      private void initializeBookData()
      Method to initialize book datas to AVL tree according to their IDs Every book's name,author name,ID , time and status initialized

    • initializeLibrarianData

      private void initializeLibrarianData()
      Method to initialize librarian datas to skip list according to their IDs Every librarian's name,surname,ID and password initialized

    • acceptRejectTableReservation

      protected static void acceptRejectTableReservation​(Student student)
      Method to approve or deny table reservation for student request If there is empty table at the library it takes TableID then according to table's status approves or denies reservation If there is no empty table at the library it asks user whether wait or not then according to answer adds user to waiting queue or not
      Parameters:
      student - Student object to represent who wants to reserve table

    • approveTableTimeExtend

      protected static void approveTableTimeExtend​(Student student)
      Method to approve or deny table reservation time extend for 1 hour If there is table already reserved for given student it approves , otherwise denies
      Parameters:
      student - Student object to represent who wants to extend table time

    • approveLeaveTable

      protected static void approveLeaveTable​(Student student)
      Method to approve or deny leaving table If there is already reserved table for given student approves , otherwise denies
      Parameters:
      student - Student object to represent who wants to leave table

    • approveTableBreak

      protected static void approveTableBreak​(Student student)
      Method to approve or deny taking break If there is already reserved table for given student approves, otherwise denies request
      Parameters:
      student - Student object to represent who wants to take a break

    • showBook

      protected static void showBook()
      This method travel tree and add them to a list after for Id it categorize books for categories and for authors and we implemented MultiMap class for it it hold books in same Key in MultiMap and it show the book's details if this category or author doesn't exist it doesn't print and print error to screen

    • mainMenu

      public void mainMenu()
      It is the main menu that appears first after the program is opened.There are 3 options. These are log in operation, sign up operation and exit. If the user enter the 1 (exit) program is shut down. If the user signs in, the sign up menu opens. If the log is done, the student or employee is asked. There are also 3 options for log in operation. These are student log in, librarian log in and exit. If the user does the student operation, the student menu opens. If the Librarian process, the librarian menu opens. Return to the upper menu of Exit course

    • studentMenu

      private void studentMenu​(java.lang.String type, Student student)
      If the incoming student object is not null, the transaction is performed. There are 3 basic operations that the student will do. The first is exit. If the user says exit, he returns to a top menu. The second is Book Option. If the user chooses the Book Option option, the Book menu opens. The third basic operation of the student is the Table option, if the table option is selected, the table menu opens and finally, in the profile option, the student can view and change their profile information.
      Parameters:
      type - student or librarian
      student - real object object of the student who program user.

    • profileOption

      public void profileOption​(User user)
      In profile option, all profile information is printed on the screen. There are three options. These are name, surname and password change. With the option 1, the password is changed with the name 2 option and the last name 3 option. 4 option to exit and return to the upper menu
      Parameters:
      user - user object to process

    • studentBookOption

      private void studentBookOption​(Student user)
      There are 6 options for the Student Book menu. 1 show book. You can see all the books in the library with the show book option. 2 Search Book. With the Search Book option, you can search by the name of the author, by the name of the book, or by the category of books. 3 Request Book. With Request Book, you may want to buy a book that is also in the library. If you are eligible to request a book, it is given to you. 4 Extend Time Book. Each book is given for 15 days. In this option, you can extend the book's stay. 5 Show Book info. With this option, you can access the information of your books and the duration of the book. 6 exit. With the exit option you will return to the upper menu
      Parameters:
      user - user object to process

    • studentTableOption

      private void studentTableOption​(Student user)
      There are 7 options for the student table menu. You can see all tables in the library with 1 show table show table option. With the 2 reserve table option, you can request any available table. 3 You can take a break with Take a break. 4 You can leave the table with Leave table. With 5 extend time tables, you can extend your stay on the table. The duration of stay at the table for each user is 1 hour. With Check table time, you can learn the time you stay at the table. With 7 exit you will return to the upper menu.
      Parameters:
      user - user object to process

    • librarianMenu

      private void librarianMenu​(java.lang.String type, Librarian librarian)
      The librarian menu has 3 options. With 1 open your profile, you can view and edit all your profile information. With 2 Book option menu, you go to the librarian's book menu. With 3 table options, you go to the librarian's table menu. With 4 exits you will return to the upper menu
      Parameters:
      type - student or librarian
      librarian - user object to process

    • librarianBookOption

      private void librarianBookOption​(Librarian user)
      There are 5 operations you can do in the librarian book menu. With 1 show books, you can see all the books in the library. With 2 search book, you can search for a specific book. With 3 add books, you can add new books to the library. With 4 exit you will return to the upper menu.
      Parameters:
      user - user object to process

    • librarianTableOption

      private void librarianTableOption​(Librarian user)
      There are 3 transactions in the Librarian table option menu. With 1 show table you can see all tables and their status. With 2 cancel table reservation, you can cancel the reservation of a student with a table. With 3 exit you will return to the upper menu.
      Parameters:
      user - user object to process

    • signUp

      public void signUp()
      3 options are registered to the system with the sign up menu, one of them is student. With Student, you enroll in the student system. secondly, with librarian you register to the librarian system and thirdly with exit you return to 1 upper menu

    • createUser

      private User createUser​(java.lang.String type)
      It takes input from the sign up menu as a parameter. If parameter 1 is the student, the parameter 2 is the librarian. Name surname password id information is entered. In case any input is entered, exit is returned to the upper menu.
      Parameters:
      type - User user is abstract class parent for student class and librarian class
      Returns:
      to user in student list or librarian list.

    • logIn

      public User logIn​(java.lang.String type)
      In accordance with the information received, the user object to be processed is returned. First of all, the id entered by the user is checked in the system. and in total they have 4 rights to enter id. If the entered id is in the system, that object temp is thrown to a reference. password control is done. The password received from the user is checked with the password in temp. the user has a total of 4 rights.
      Parameters:
      type - student or librarian
      Returns:
      user object to process

    • IDControl

      private User IDControl​(java.lang.String type, int i)
      It takes 2 parameters. 1. Have the status of the user. If the user is a student, a search is made for the student skip list with the entered id. If the object is found, it is returned. If not found, it is null returned. for the user librarian, a search is made in the arraylist.
      Parameters:
      type - student or librarian
      i - right to try
      Returns:
      user object or null

    • passwordControl

      private boolean passwordControl​(User temp, int i)
      The password entered with the password that comes as a parameter is checked. If passwords are the same, true is different, false is returned. The total trial right is 4.
      Parameters:
      temp - user object whose password will be checked
      i - right to try
      Returns:
      return true if equals password else false.
